session_info.title: 10-Minute Stress Relief Meditation
session_info.description: Release tension and find calm with guided mindfulness

instructions: Find a comfortable seated position
Close your eyes or soften your gaze
Place hands gently on your knees or in your lap
Allow your body to settle
Begin to notice your breath without changing it
Feel your body in contact with your seat
Notice any areas of tension or stress
Acknowledge these sensations without judgment
phases.guidance: If your mind wanders, gently return attention to your breath

instructions: Now begin to deepen your breath slightly
Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 counts
Hold gently for 2 counts
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 6 counts
Continue this rhythm: 4-2-6
phases.benefits: Activates relaxation response, calms nervous system

instructions: Bring attention to the top of your head
Slowly scan down through your body
Notice: forehead, jaw, neck, shoulders
Continue: chest, arms, stomach, hips, legs
With each exhale, release any tension you find
phases.visualization: Imagine stress leaving your body like dark clouds dissolving

instructions: Return to natural breathing
Notice how your body feels now
Set an intention for peace to continue
When ready, gently open your eyes

closing_affirmation: I am calm, centered, and at peace
tips: Use this meditation anytime you feel overwhelmed
Remember: there's no perfect way to meditate
